description:
A photographic editorial of Lloyd Klein(TM) Swimwear and Lingerie as seen through the eye of lensman, Robert Voltaire...

French Couturier Lloyd Klein is the favored red carpet designer dressing 100’s of  “icons and ingénues” ranging from Natalie Cole, Faye Dunaway and Tyra Banks to AnnaLynne McCord, Hayden Panetierre, and Christina Aguilera. The House is now launching several new divisions which include: a couture-inspired denim line; ready to wear collections for both day and evening; shoes and handbags; as well as a poolside and swimwear collection, and eyewear. 

You can see  it all first – here is this amazing collection of photographs shot by Robert Voltaire, who’s work has been published by magazines worldwide including: GQ, Esquire, Vogue, Cosmopolitan, Max, Playboy and others. 

─────────────
FEATURES
• Save any image – Set any image as your background
• Quick Browse – Swipe right or left to quickly browse our entire library
• Exclusive – You won’t find these photographs in any other apps.
• Near HD Quality Resolution–Looks amazing on your Palm Pre/Pixi

─────────────

ABOUT ON THE GO GIRLS
#1 Publisher of Sexy Apps, On The Go Girls achieved 3 million sexy app downloads in January 2010 and is dedicated to bringing the sexiest apps to your Palm :-)

All photos and videos are properly licensed and used with permission from the copyright holder.  No stolen or “borrowed” or otherwise misappropriated photos or videos.
